TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed OptionTextAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class OptionTextAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class OptionTextAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: El compilador de Visual Basic emite esta clase auxiliar para indicar (en la depuración de Visual Basic) qué opción de comparación, de texto o binaria, se utiliza.

span.span: The Visual Basic compiler emits this helper class to indicate (for Visual Basic debugging) which comparison option, binary or text, is being used

remarks.format: ## Remarks Uso de esta clase es similar a especificar la opción de texto en el [instrucción Option Compare](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/option-compare-statement.md).Use of this class is similar to specifying the text option in the [Option Compare Statement](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/option-compare-statement.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks Uso de esta clase es similar a especificar la opción de texto en el [instrucción Option Compare](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/option-compare-statement.md).Use of this class is similar to specifying the text option in the [Option Compare Statement](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/option-compare-statement.md).
